html:
4.17.20  3:16 pm   was homework ever a big problem in your life? like, did you get distracted on homework when you were younger and was it bad for you? i get distracted on homework a lot. right now i should be doing it but am not.

      i vaguelly recall some adults requesting that i make terribly contrived and useless pieces of work. and i recall being unable to cope with the nature of that request. i don't remember how or if the situation was ever resolved

4.17.20  3:12 pm   Do you egg?

      no, but i can see why you would think that

4.17.20  3:10 pm   When are you ready to start posting again

      NOWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW iwish

4.17.20  2:26 pm   who are you and why

      i have launched a vehement investigation (vehestigation)

4.17.20  2:02 pm   Are you trying to make your songs as normal as possible?

      yes but some times i screw up and do the exact opposite

4.17.20  2:01 pm   https://billwurtz.com/questions/capitals-report.php does this include questions or is it only your answers

      answers only, including the questions would be drastically cheating because those were written by other people

4.17.20  1:46 pm   4.17.20  12:43 am Are your children on fire??? your video children???

      yes, and music (song)

4.17.20  1:37 pm   How long after your next video will you release another one?

     1 to 3 weeks or die trying

      Are you shooting for a schedule after the countdown timer is 0?

     extremely yes

4.17.20  1:35 pm   why is the world stupid and dumb sometimes?

      due to the very high extreme amounts of intelligence

4.17.20  1:32 pm   What software do you use to write music,

     primarily quicktime and textedit. oops, quicktime is dead, now i'll have to find a combination of 4 different programs to do what quicktime pro 7 could do

     is everything recorded if possible or do you just use plugins.

     very important to demo how each part goes, so i know for sure. or use melody/chord notation, which is what i used to do, in which case that would be exclusively on physical paper

      How do you decide when to do what?

      i usually keep going to touch the door and then come back and play through it and listen very carefully when i get to the known end

4.17.20  1:27 pm   Opinion on putting arbitrary limitations on yourself when writing music?

     can be very useful

      Like Paul McCartney did when he wrote a tune only using two fingers (the song "When The Wind Is Blowing")

4.17.20  1:16 pm   do i exsit

      oh that would explain a lot

4.17.20  1:16 pm   When is your next vid?

      i am having a countdown timer

4.17.20  1:00 pm   do you like star wars?

      sometimes i wonder if there will ever be peace, in the stars

4.17.20  12:56 pm   are you inspired by anyone in particular?

     no, only everyone

      i feel like this is one of those classic questions every big internet person is asked but im still interested

4.17.20  12:53 pm   the library is closed and i have no books to read :( any suggestions for what i should do instead?

      you can read books on the internet

4.17.20  12:52 pm   Are you working on a big project?

      i am project

4.17.20  12:47 pm   i want a q&a

      ok i will see what i can do

4.17.20  12:40 pm   what is the answer to life and everything in the universe

      could be you

4.17.20  12:24 pm   How do you feel about saxophones?

      they are like Telephones but a slightly different shape

4.17.20  12:17 pm   do you think your music is good

      it's my job to make sure it is. whether i have failed or not is a different story

4.17.20  12:14 pm   WWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWUWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW can you spot the different letter

      yes

4.17.20  12:07 pm   what are trees

      ridiculous

4.17.20  12:06 pm   57?

      19x3

4.17.20  12:01 pm   am i human

      oh that would explain a lot

4.17.20  11:58 am   i wanna go outside

      ah, #relatable

4.17.20  11:37 am   how much oatmeal have you consumed during this quarantine?

      more than i ever knew existed

4.17.20  11:34 am   How do you manage to make your videos so dense with information when most are only about 2 to 3 minutes?

      make sure the information is positioned at exactly the right angle and time, with graphics, and my other secret ingredient

4.17.20  11:29 am   How do I find new music?

      you might have to make your own

4.17.20  11:25 am   do flowers bloom?

      oh that would explain a lot

4.17.20  11:19 am   what even is relevancy anyway?    ..

      whether or not 1 thing is related or useful to another second thing

4.17.20  10:48 am   How small's an atom?

      put it this way, i would recommend you get more than 1

4.17.20  9:55 am   make moar videos

      that is a great plan which i almost didn't think of except i did and am doing it

4.17.20  9:54 am   are you see me?

      not quite

4.17.20  9:54 am   What is your favorite brass instrument

      horn

4.17.20  9:34 am   Can i be friends with you?

      ok

4.17.20  9:27 am   do you exist in a vacuum

      no

4.17.20  9:23 am   I went to the mount st helens gift shop and it was closed. The manager told me to lodge all complaints with you. Now what?

      i would like to go ahead and counter-lodge that complaint right back to the manager

4.17.20  9:17 am   what have you discovered

      coins are very difficult to unflip

4.17.20  9:13 am   how is 3020

      151x20

4.17.20  9:10 am   what is backwards of backwards

      forwards

4.17.20  8:49 am   what does randy mean

      ready and excited to read randomly selected questions from the questions archives

4.17.20  8:49 am   help, i'm lost in a calendar

      ah, #relatable

4.17.20  8:48 am   how do i ask a question without forgetting that i have asked a question

      how do i answer it without forgetting that i've answered it

4.17.20  8:37 am   what do you do in your spare time?

      there is no time to spare

4.17.20  8:36 am   what should i create?

      how about the whole world

4.17.20  8:36 am   i just dont feel good in general, physically, mentally, and emotionally, any advice?

      WaLk ArOuND

4.17.20  8:34 am   lemon or lime

      limon

4.17.20  8:12 am   What should I do when the walls start talking?

      listen respectfully

4.17.20  7:51 am   When is your next video?

      i'm having a countdown timer
